fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Bite: Deal a Basic Attack to your target. They will also Flinch, which has all properties of a roleblock, except they are not notified of it.
-Storm Surge (2-shot): Choose up to 3 players. For the next three nights, one of them will Flinch, with the order determined by ascending post count order. **Locked**: In addition, you will learn the order.
-Snowball (**Locked**, 1-shot): Occurs instantaneously. All Beasts are Unlocked for this phase. Any Beasts who haven't met their unlock conditions will become Locked again after the phase ends.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will appear as **Bitten by Gef**
-**Locked**: You have passive Basic Defense.
-**Unlock Condition**: If any beast has used all of their abilities (including Locked abilities) at least once, Unlock.
